name: admin.conversations.createForObjects
desc: Create a Salesforce channel for the corresponding object provided.

invite_object_team.desc: Optional flag to add all team members related to the object to the newly created Salesforce channel. When true, adds a maximum of 100 team members to the channel.

object_id.desc: Object / Record ID (15 or 18 digit accepted). See [here](https://help.salesforce.com/s/articleView?id=000385008&type=1) for how to look up an ID.

salesforce_org_id.desc: Salesforce org ID (15 or 18 digit accepted). See [here](https://help.salesforce.com/s/articleView?id=000385215&type=1) for how to look up Salesforce org ID.

errors.restricted_action: User does not have access to perform this action.
errors.channel_already_exists: Object is linked to a different channel.
errors.missing_record_channel_config: Record Channels are not enabled for the given object type.
